body:
treehouse

➸ pairing: peter parker x reader

➸ type: imagine, fluff, friends to lovers ish, lowkey crack, slice of life

➸ warnings: none

➸ summary: years ago you and your friends had discovered a treehouse, which became the place of many memories. one more memory was coming your way. one you never thought would happen.

“Hurry up!”

You called back to your companions as you sprinted through the trees, leaping over each root like a hurdle. Your heart raced with excitement and adrenaline pumped through your veins.

“Wait up!” Ned huffed, clearly struggling to keep up. You groaned a little at his call and slowed to a jog.

Peter had been following closely behind you, his spidey abilities having given him the stamina to be able to keep up. He nudged you with a grin on his face that made your heart beat a little faster than it already had been.

“Race you?”

“Oh, you’re so on!”

The two of you took off through the trees, leaving Ned and MJ to stop, panting.

MJ places her hands on her knees as she tried to regain her breath. “Damned superheroes.”

Your legs moved quickly, fuelled by your determination to beat Peter to the treehouse. You let out a laugh as you ran, hair whipping around you. Times like these were exhilarating.

The treehouse soon came into view and you felt satisfaction at the thought of winning. At that moment, a shadow sped along the ground as something flew directly above your head. Alarmed, you skidded to a stop about three metres away from the treehouse. Peter landed in front of you, a web shooter attached to his palms.

Grinning, he touched his fingers to the tree, making it agonisingly slow for emphasis. “I win.”

“No fair,” you groaned. “That was totally cheating.”

He only grinned at you before starting to climb the ladder up to the treehouse. You followed, still grumbling about the completely disrespectful act of cheating.

“I’m just saying, I played fair. You should’ve played fair as well, but you didn’t, which means you’re disqualified, which means I technically won,” you complained as you climbed through the hole.

Peter offered you a hand and helped pull you into the treehouse. “No, I beat you, so I won fair and square.”

“Yeah, right,” you scoffed, getting to your feet.

Peter continued, ignoring you. “And since I won, I think I should get a prize.”

You raised your eyebrows at him, looking at him suspiciously. “What sort of prize do you want?”

“Well, I was thinking…maybe a kiss?”

You stared at him. Had you heard that right? Had he just said that? Was Peter Parker flirting with you? You suddenly became aware of how close you two were standing.

Apparently you had been staring at him for a little too long, because Peter became flustered. He took a step back, cheeks flushed as he started stuttering.

“Oh no, I’m so, so sorry, (Y/N), I didn’t mean it like that. Oh god, can we please forget I said it?”

It was amazing to watch how he could go from confident to awkward in such a short time span. Regaining your senses, you took a step forward and wrapped your arms around his neck. He stared at you wide eyed, trying to process what was happening.

You leaned in slowly, eyes flickering between Peter’s lips and his eyes, which were doing the same to you. The two of you drew closer, and then…

You leaned around to peck him on the cheek instead.

You erupted into a fit of giggles, scrambling to climb down the ladder and running past Ned and MJ, who were red faced and panting.

Peter stood in the treehouse, frozen. He was still trying to process what had just happened.

Ned’s head popped up through the entrance to the treehouse. “You okay, dude?”

Peter’s hand rose to his cheek slowly and he couldn’t help but smile. He turned to look at his friend. “Yeah, I’m okay.”

summary: i also redboxed spider verse, and they had the far from home trailer, and suddenly i was all, i mean it's just one scene and...
body:
i also redboxed spider verse, and they had the far from home trailer, and suddenly i was all, i mean it’s just one scene and they had enough characters already but, did mj and the rest of peter and ned’s friends just take a different bus?

anyways when is the ned / luis / darcy team-up
